summary: THE  WIPER MOTOR ASSEMBLY SNAPPED WHERE THE MOTOR CONNECTS TO THE WIPER ARMS MAKING THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS INOPERABLE. SECOND FAILURE WAS WIPER MOTOR DUE TO WATER INTRUSION.  THE WIPER FAILED TO OPERATE DURING RAIN.  ALSO TURNED ON BY THEMSELVES AFTER CAR WASH BUT COULDN'T BE TURNED OFF.  THE WIPERS WORKED PROPERLY AFTER THE WIPER MOTOR DRIED OUT.
